nodes.text: Professionals at Work is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on October 14, 2004 and took the form of an encounter between the Cerean bounty hunter Sai-Ani Kannu and a new employer. The employer presented Sai-Ani with a list of eleven individuals within the Cularin system who had contracts on their life. In a move that surprised Sai-Ani, he then requested the bounty hunter ensure that none of the individuals are killed by the inevitable assassins that would take up the contracts offered by the Navy of Thaere.
In the context of the Living Force campaign, this article granted player-characters a web certificate for a secret benefactor, giving them bonuses to certain dice rolls.
